item.title: fountains
item.description: i think fountains are really nice. they improve the overall vibe of a public space by at least 80%.

item.title: my philosophy behind this site
item.description: i'm pretty tired of websites having a 1-10 megabyte file size per page, 90% of which is unneeded javascript libraries or giant, uncompressed images.

item.title: insidious files
item.description: however, firefox's network tool showed me that my favicon was adding a whopping 100kb to every page!

item.title: pool topology
item.description: i like swimming a lot; so when choosing a hotel, the pool is a pretty significant factor for me. how big is it? is it indoors or outdoors? how deep is it? what is its shape?

item.title: the tower
item.description: hesitating a little, i ventured within via the main entrance.

item.title: making myself anonymous, or, how to remove data from radaris
item.description: moral of the story is, don't use the internet, and fuck radaris.
